decks.notes: This deck focuses on using lands to generate extra mana and power out big creatures like Primeval Titan. By utilizing cards like Amulet of Vigor and The One Ring, the deck can take advantage of its unique land base to quickly assemble powerful combinations. With multiple ways to search for key pieces and ramp up mana production, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with its powerful creatures and potent lands. The deck's synergy between its various components allows for explosive plays and consistent threats, leading to a formidable and versatile strategy in Modern 1 vs 1 play.

This deck focuses on assembling a variety of creatures with unique abilities to create powerful combos and synergies. The creatures toolbox allows for versatility in different situations, while cards like Chord of Calling and Yawgmoth, Thran Physician help tutor for specific creatures needed for the combo. Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Zulaport Cutthroat provide additional value by draining opponents or sacrificing creatures for advantage. The deck also includes disruption elements like Fulminator Mage and Malevolent Rumble to control the board. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with its versatile and powerful creatures.

The key concept of this Merfolk aggro deck is to quickly build a board presence of Merfolk creatures, utilizing lords like Lord of Atlantis and Master of the Pearl Trident to buff them up. Aether Vial allows for quick creature deployment, while disruption cards like Harbinger of the Seas and Merfolk Trickster provide control options. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of creatures, backed up by counterspells like Force of Negation and Flare of Denial to protect its board. Mutavault and Cavern of Souls provide additional utility and mana fixing for the deck.

The main focus of this Merfolk Aggro deck is to quickly build a board presence and overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of aquatic creatures. By utilizing powerful lords like Lord of Atlantis and Master of the Pearl Trident, as well as disruptive cards like Harbinger of the Tides and Vodalian Hexcatcher, the deck aims to control the tempo of the game and push for a fast victory. With a mix of counterspells like Flare of Denial and Force of Negation, as well as land disruption with Rishadan Port, the deck strives to disrupt the opponent while building a powerful board presence.

The deck focuses on utilizing artifacts and controlling the game through Urza, Lord High Artificer. It includes a variety of artifact creatures and spells to generate card advantage, disrupt opponents, and create a strong board presence. The deck runs a mix of efficient removal, counter spells, and powerful artifacts such as Thopter Foundry and Sword of the Meek combo for additional value. Urza's Saga is used to tutor for key pieces while providing additional threats. The land base includes utility lands to further enhance the deck's control elements.
